about_the_game:
The Monster Hunter Rise Original Soundtrack comes to Steam! 4 discs' worth of monstrously epic themes and Japanese folk-inspired songs await your ears.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
